intro.intro: I live in Montreal as a Fullstack Web developer, enjoying this spectacular corner of the world and doing what I love the most: developing Applications and Web Pages, always trying to exceed myself and giving the best I have.

start.knowme: and know a lot more about me.

about.content:
Computers represent my career and my life. I have a degree in Computer Science. I am a versatile person who has performed in different areas, always associated with information technology. I consider myself a passionate Programmer. Since I was very young, I have explored this field in languages such as Basic, Fortran, PL/1 and Cobol, among others. Subsequently, I began programming in Visual Basic (later, VB.NET).
My specialty is developing WEB Applications as FullStack. I have substantial knowledge in this subject since I am an indefatigable self-taught person.
In 2016, I participated in the Skylab Coders Academy Bootcamp as “Web Development Fullstack MEAN”. This experience brought me a solid knowledge of new technologies and helped me to reinforce important concepts. In June 2020, I got a DEC (Diploma of College Studies) in “Computer Science - Administrative Data Processing“ at LaSalle College, Montreal.
In one of my lastest jobs at Zemsania Tech Services, I worked as programmer of an application based on Angular and Node.js.
I have an excellent capacity to adapt and I am a very detail oriented person in every aspect of my life. As a professional, my desire is to continue preparing myself and work among the best of the industry.

lasalle.title: Computer Science - Administrative Data Processing
lasalle.content: This program prepares the computer technician to locate, collect and analyze data on the users' information processing needs. Modeling and processing data to develop a code to create efficient applications according to the data collected and to anticipate needs regarding the network infrastructure. (Currently studying the third semester).

technologia.title: Agile Project Management - SCRUM
technologia.content: To provide the knowledge required for in-depth understanding of the roles, aspects and attributes of the Scrum approach and acquire PSM I Certification.

cisco.title: IT Essentials - Cisco Networking Academy® Program Certification
cisco.content: Hardware and software, computer components, parts assembly, operating systems administration, troubleshoot, connectivity and networking. Working with desktops laptops and mobile devices. Wireless connectivity, security, safety, environmental issues and communication skills.

skylab.title: Web Development Fullstack MEAN Bootcamp
skylab.content: Located in Barcelona, Spain, Skylab Coders Academy is a leading center in Web developer training. Intensive Web application development classes are taught using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Javascript, Angular, NodeJS, MongoDB, React, Scrum and Git, among others.

cipsa.cipsa: CIPSA Academy of Professional Informatics, Barcelona
cipsa.title: Backend / Frontend
cipsa.content: PHP with MySQL, Ajax, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery.

cepi-base.title: Web Design and Programming - Inforbooks editorial
cepi-base.content: WEB development HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, WordPress, Javascript, Dreamweaver.

une.title: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
une.content: The Computer Science graduate manages current hardware and software to assist the needs of national and international companies, and professionals from other disciplines as well. This professional is well prepared to work in a team with information systems and to adapt to new trends. They also manage cutting-edge technologies for system analysis, development and implementation.

tailbase.content: For almost three years I have had the opportunity to consolidate my knowledge and skills as a fullstack developer along with an excellent group of professionals in charge of the development, maintenance and continuous improvement of our e-commerce platform based on ColdFusion, .NET and SQL databases. Likewise, managing REST APIs, a large number of tools for both internal use and for our clients as well as supporting more than 600 e-commerce websites in Canada and the US. Our workflow as a team of programmers is based on Scrum as an Agile methodology, DevOps for the administration and automation of all processes (formerly Atlassian, Jira), and Git for version control.

zemsania.content: Colaborating for the implementation of an operational system based on the AngularJS and NodeJS framework. Start-up and implementation of an application based on Angular, Node.js, MongoDB, Webpack and Sonar for the «Work Hours and Vacations Assignment Control of the HR department».

roline.content: I collaborated, designed and developed a whole Web application (SiPEDI) aimed at solving a specific problem about the orders periodically placed by customers to suppliers. Fully developed with MEAN Web technology (MongoDB, Express, AngularJS, Node.js).

others.content: As well as being a software develor, I have worked for many years as a hardware and network administrator technician; and as a computer equipment seller as well.
